urls.title: Environment Agency launches educational tools for WOD to ‘help marine life thrive’ - Preventing Plastic Pollution
urls.description: Schools across England will mark World Ocean Day (WOD) next month (Tuesday, June 8) by exploring the journey of plastic with the Environment Agency. Primary and secondary schools are invited to view a series of online films and activities via an interactive map in advance of the event, culminating in a live question and answer sessio n with Environment Agency and World Wildlife Fund experts on the actual day. By clicking on different points of the map, students can learn how plastic pollution travels

tweets.text:
🇬🇧🇪🇺Inviting schools & teachers to get involved with this fun and interactive resource from @EnvAgency 
ahead of #WorldOceanDay. Learn about the journey of plastic from #sourcetosea with your class and join us #preventingplasticpollution  
♻️🐟🌊https://t.co/vhPnzWBQ0v https://t.co/3OkZ52gJ02

tweets.text: @tw33tie1 @EnvAgencyMids I don't think the previous owners dumped that there but again I could be wrong . I've only lived here 10 years

@EnvAgencyMids The landfill still stinks of ****. Wasn't the stench supposed to miraculously go away by the 30th April? You are still letting those cowboys get away with poisoning our town, I see. @ClareDinnisEA #StopTheStink
@EnvAgencyMids Delaying tactics yet again. Disgraceful

@EnvAgencyMids Every shop, I mean EVERY shop i went in in Newcastle today reeked of the gases from that stinking landfill, no different than any other day! it’s really worked hasn’t it @EnvAgency what are you going to do about it?

@EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA  It may be complete but we are still breathing in poisonous gases. So what’s next? More statements or are you going to do the right thing and close it down? #StopTheStink

@EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off 8 hours after this statement was made I was submitting my latest complaint by email, the turgid wreak was entering my house 2 miles away from the Landfill. This morning I have a sore throat and headache, another weekend of stink thanks @ClareDinnisEA!
@EnvAgencyMids Excuse me but it STILL STINKS and it’s still poisoning us.  Anything else is mere detail.   SOLUTIONS please.
@EnvAgencyMids What the hell is that picture? This one is better, doesn't look capped to me, what are you trying to pull? https://t.co/mPkA00MuA3

@EnvAgencyMids You didn't #stopthestink the capping was going to happen anyway, what have you done today to stop the stench keeping me awake all night tonight, headaches, stinging eyes, heaving, like last night & night before X several months. @AaronBell4NUL sort em out.

@davemh72 @EnvAgencyMids Need to step #stopthestink up now they cannot treat human beings like this @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL find us a refuge until the poison has gone, our town is finished, my burgess ancestors will be turning in their graves. 😡

urls.title: NP11 and partners appoint Strategic Lead for Place and Culture in the North | Cumbria LEP
urls.description: The NP11 group of Northern Local Enterprise Partnerships (LEPs), along with Arts Council England, the Environment Agency, Historic England and the National Lottery Heritage Fund, has recruited a new strategic appointment to support the development of Place and Culture for the North. Clare Devaney joins as Strategic Lead from April 2021 as part of the NP11’s aim to ensure that the North is recognised as a culturally vibrant and economically successful place by utilising cultural assets and place-based

tweets.text:

tweets.text: @davemh72 @EnvAgencyMids Yes it's possible but it could be  historical too. If they had a gypsum waste cell there previously and it has been overlain by biodegradable waste with no separation then the reaction will produce H2S. The site has expanded a lot recently possibly accelerating this process.

Our officers have been out & about this weekend further to reports of odour from #WalleysQuarry #NewcastleUnderLyme 
 
We detected odour at numerous locations & last week issued the operator with further actions to improve its management of landfill gas as quickly as possible. https://t.co/zoXM4W2yrW

@EnvAgencyMids This is what I put on my flowers #MentalHealthAwarenessWeek smelling outside is far different to having to sit for hours/day with it in your home your sanctuary the place you should rest and relax close it down #StopTheStink https://t.co/kuwts7t6I5

urls.title: The nitrate leaching tool
urls.description: A tool to estimate annual losses of nitrate at the field and farm scale using data provided by farmers during farm visits.

tweets.text: Excess loss of nutrients can cause harm to the environment & pollution-NLT helps farmers & advisers quantify nutrient losses occurring across their land & identify measures they can put in place to maximise nutrient management efficiencies. See more ⬇️ 3/3 https://t.co/af6Ykc2L93

Even if you don't live near a river you could be at risk from other sources of #flooding & need to consider #PFR to protect your property 💧 

Check if you’re at risk from other types of flooding here ➡️ https://t.co/bpmkttq3Lx @EnvAgencyNW 

#floodaware #floodreilience #flooding https://t.co/MfMtO54knH

@tw33tie1 @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @WalleysQuarry @NewsNBC @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency hang on , gypsum has been banned from landfills for 16 years so if they've been dumping that in there surely you should prosecute ! https://t.co/kDVNc9K03j

Reducing elevated #nitrate in #groundwater is a major challenge @EnvAgency has developed the ‘Nitrate Leaching Tool’ estimating annual losses at field & farm scale using data provided by farmers. NTL will help identify more sustainable farming practices that prevent pollution 1/3 https://t.co/zh9iyJBpAi
